root.name: Madou Monogatari ARS
root.description: OverviewMadou Monogatari ARS is a prequel to the original Madou Monogatari trilogy, 1-2-3. The series was developed for the PC98; aside from a Game Gear port of Arle's chapter, the trilogy was not released on any other platform. Like its predecessor, ARS features almost no numerical stats. The game is named after the three playable characters: Arle Nadja, Rulue, and Schezo Wegey.
